hotelname: Oasia Hotel Novena, Singapore By Far East Hospitality
title: Very friendly staff
desc: Stayed for a week here and the staff were very friendly and attended to all my requests very timely. The room was also very spacious and the toilet was big enough. The views were amazing and the everything was good. Thank you!

hotelname: Oasia Hotel Novena, Singapore By Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service, superb experience!
desc: The hotel room is very spacious and clean, the place is centrally located and the best of all, the service provided was top-notch! I stayed here for a week, and my needs were very promptly attended to. When I called to report an issue, within 30mins it was fixed! Thank you Yati and team, for going the extra mile to make sure that what I needed were provided. Their proactiveness made my stay a very enjoyable and pleasurable one! Hope to be back again!

hotelname: Oasia Hotel Novena, Singapore By Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: Great service from Oasia Hotel! i was placed in Oasia Hotel with an isolation order from MOH on my return from Ethiopia. the stay is more like a staycation albeit being confined in the room. the staff were great, cheerfully calling me every morning to check my well-being. i must say the pillows were great helping me to overcome my jetlag.

hotelname: Oasia Hotel Novena, Singapore By Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Comfortable room, bathroom, and Excellent Service, special mention to Resni, Princess, Iryati and Syamil. The room view was amazing. Ideal for short stays in central area. Highly recommended . Thanks
